title: Does anybody receive their Pulsefire Ezreal Icon?
body: Still not receive today and i already i had that skin few months ago by gift

replies.body:
Those [**PFE Icons**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pulsefire-caitlyn?utm_source=LeagueClient&utm_medium=OverviewTier2Pos1) are still going out, so no worries just yet! They should all be given out by 5/29, so hit us up if you don't have it by then.

EDIT: Got my wires crossed a bit with these icons. As far as I know, anyone who owns PFE (regardless of purchase date) should be getting those special icons. 5/29 is the date for the Dark Star icons. Forgive me for my sins!!!
